name: Rolling Chicken TD
description:
Developed for Ludum Dare #46
Theme: Keep it alive.

The legendary Rolling Chicken is trying to defend her eggs!
Do everything you can to keep the eggs alive against the enemies, it’s the only way to save the Rolling Chicken lineage.

Use the mouse to play!

The Towers

Rolling Chicken – One of a kind tower, the legendary chicken keeps dealing damage by rolling through the enemies.
Soliders – The cheapest one, fires a single shot that deals damage.
Hot Wings – It's getting hot here! Deal damage to multiple enemies by breathing fire.
Sorceregg – Well, now it’s cold. Uses magic to slow the enemies.
Samurai – I can cut everything! Slashes the air and creates a energy wave that pierces multiple enemies. 

The enemies

Snake – The most common enemy, not very fast nor tanky.
Badger – The fastest enemy, he’ll steal your eggs.
Crow – The flying enemy! Takes halved damage from the Hot Wings and Samurai towers.
Komodo Dragon – The slow and steady tanky enemy!

Did you like it?
Rate us on Ludum Dare website: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/rolling-chicken-td
